motivational.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
motivational.author: Steve Jobs

motivational.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
motivational.author: Winston Churchill

motivational.text: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
motivational.author: Sam Levenson

motivational.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
motivational.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

motivational.text: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
motivational.author: Aristotle

motivational.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
motivational.author: Theodore Roosevelt

motivational.text: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
motivational.author: Tony Robbins

motivational.text: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
motivational.author: Unknown

motivational.text: Great things never come from comfort zones.
motivational.author: Unknown

wisdom.text: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
wisdom.author: Socrates

wisdom.text: In the end, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends.
wisdom.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

wisdom.text: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
wisdom.author: Lao Tzu

wisdom.text: Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, today is a gift of God, which is why we call it the present.
wisdom.author: Bill Keane

wisdom.text: A wise man learns more from his enemies than a fool from his friends.
wisdom.author: Baltasar Gracián

wisdom.text: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
wisdom.author: Chinese Proverb

wisdom.text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
wisdom.author: Confucius

wisdom.text: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.text: Experience is the teacher of all things.
wisdom.author: Julius Caesar

wisdom.text: The only way to make sense out of change is to plunge into it, move with it, and join the dance.
wisdom.author: Alan Watts

humor.text: I haven't failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
humor.author: Thomas Edison

humor.text: I'm not superstitious, but I am a little stitious.
humor.author: Michael Scott

humor.text: The trouble with having an open mind, of course, is that people will insist on coming along and trying to put things in it.
humor.author: Terry Pratchett

humor.text: I can resist everything except temptation.
humor.author: Oscar Wilde

humor.text: Age is an issue of mind over matter. If you don't mind, it doesn't matter.
humor.author: Mark Twain

humor.text: I love deadlines. I like the whooshing sound they make as they fly by.
humor.author: Douglas Adams

humor.text: The difference between stupidity and genius is that genius has its limits.
humor.author: Albert Einstein

humor.text: Time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time.
humor.author: Marthe Troly-Curtin

humor.text: I'm writing a book. I've got the page numbers done.
humor.author: Steven Wright

humor.text: The early bird might get the worm, but the second mouse gets the cheese.
humor.author: Willie Nelson

success.text: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
success.author: Albert Schweitzer

success.text: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
success.author: John D. Rockefeller

success.text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
success.author: Walt Disney

success.text: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
success.author: Winston Churchill

success.text: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
success.author: Chris Grosser

success.text: Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.
success.author: Will Rogers

success.text: You learn more from failure than from success. Don't let it stop you. Failure builds character.
success.author: Unknown

success.text: If you are not willing to risk the usual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.
success.author: Jim Rohn

success.text: Success is the sum of small efforts repeated day in and day out.
success.author: Robert Collier

success.text: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
success.author: Colin R. Davis

life.text: Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans.
life.author: John Lennon

life.text: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.text: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
life.author: Confucius

life.text: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.
life.author: Oprah Winfrey

life.text: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
life.author: Charles R. Swindoll

life.text: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
life.author: Abraham Lincoln

life.text: Life is a succession of lessons which must be lived to be understood.
life.author: Helen Keller

life.text: You have within you right now, everything you need to deal with whatever the world can throw at you.
life.author: Brian Tracy

life.text: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
life.author: George Bernard Shaw

life.text: The good life is one inspired by love and guided by knowledge.
life.author: Bertrand Russell

inspiration.text: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
inspiration.author: Oscar Wilde

inspiration.text: Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe.
inspiration.author: Albert Einstein

inspiration.text: A room without books is like a body without a soul.
inspiration.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

inspiration.text: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
inspiration.author: Mae West

inspiration.text: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
inspiration.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspiration.text: If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything.
inspiration.author: Mark Twain

inspiration.text: A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you.
inspiration.author: Elbert Hubbard

inspiration.text: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people just exist.
inspiration.author: Oscar Wilde

inspiration.text: Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that.
inspiration.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

inspiration.text: The only way out of the labyrinth of suffering is to forgive.
inspiration.author: John Green
